push_button.description: Push the button on the camera to start recording.

dust_off_button.description: Dust off the button on the camera.

record_video.description: Press the camera button to record a video.

initiate_button.description: Press the camera's button to initiate the device.

swipe_button.description: Swipe the camera's button to remove any dust particles.

capture_photo.description: Press the camera button to capture a photo.

polish_button.description: Polish the camera button to maintain its shine.

press_button.description: Press the camera button to take a picture.

clean_button.description: Clean the camera button for smooth operation.

rotate_lens_to_zoom_in.description: Rotate the camera lens to zoom in on an object.

rotate_lens_to_zoom_out.description: Rotate the camera lens to zoom out from an object.

wipe_lens.description: Clean the camera lens to make the image clearer.

zoom_lens.description: Zoom in the lens of the camera to focus on the object.

adjust_lens.description: Rotate the camera lens to adjust the focusing point.

cleanse_lens.description: Cleanse the camera lens to clear out any dirt or smudges.

focus_object.description: Rotate the camera lens to focus on the object at a distance.

polish_lens.description: Polish the camera lens to remove any smudges.

clean_lens.description: Clean the camera lens to ensure clear shots.

rotate_lens.description: Rotate the camera lens to focus on the object.

change_mode.description: Rotate the knob of the camera to change its mode.

rotate_knob_to_open_menu.description: Rotate the knob on the camera to open the settings menu.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob of the camera to ensure smooth function.

turn_knob.description: Turn the camera's knob for adjusting its functions.

swipe_knob.description: Swipe the camera's knob to clean any dust particles.

adjust_knob.description: Adjust the camera knob to change the mode.

polish_knob.description: Polish the camera knob to maintain its shine.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the camera knob to adjust the settings.

clean_body.description: Clean the body of the camera to maintain its appearance.

clean_camera.description: Clean all parts of the camera to ensure optimal functionality.

body_swipe.description: Swipe the entire camera body to keep it neat and tidy.

polish_camera_body.description: Polish the camera body to maintain its appearance.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the camera body to keep it neat and clean.

dust_off_camera.description: Dust off the entire camera, including the lens, button, and knob to prevent dirt buildup.

prepare_camera_for_use.description: Prepare the camera for use by cleaning and adjusting its components.

maintain_camera.description: Maintain the entire camera's cleanliness by swiping the body, lens, button, and knob.

polish_whole_camera.description: Polish the entire camera including the camera body, lens, button, and knob.

clean_whole_camera.description: Clean the entire camera including the camera body, lens, button and knob.
